title: Invoices
description: Invoices let you bill customers for jobs.

topics.title: Change the number of decimal places in Job task quantities (Advanced)
How to save Jobs/Projects/Tasks as a template for future use
How to create a Job deposit

config.invoice_auto_renew_only_paid_invoices: Set this to 1 in order to automatically renew only paid invoices. Set to 0 to automatically renew all invoices, even those that are unpaid.
config.deposit_task_taxable_default: When creating a deposit invoice for a job this creates the task as taxable when set to 1
config.long_description_wysiwyg: Set this to 1 to enable WYSIWYG editor on invoice task description. Set it to 0 to leave it as plain text.
